text: Iñapari Airport is an airport serving the town of Iñapari, in the Madre de Dios Region of Peru. The runway is south of the town, paralleling the Interoceanic Highway, and very close to Peru's border with Brazil. ==See also== * * *Transport in Peru *List of airports in Peru ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Iñapari *OurAirports - Iñapari * Category:Airports in Peru Category:Buildings and structures in Madre de Dios Region
title: Iñapari Airport
